title: No, the video of a leopard walking across a road is not from Hyderabad
subtitle: The video shows a leopard walking on Tirumala-Tirupati roads. The video was taken on 18 April 2020. The video is not related to Hyderabad.
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that it shows a leopard walking across a road in Banjara Hills (Hyderabad). Some users are claiming that the video was taken in Jubliee Hills (Hyderabad). FACTLY has found that the video was taken on Tirumala-Tirupati road. The timestamp on the video shows that the video was taken on 18 April 2020. The video is not related to Hyderabad.

Did you watch our new video?
